Articles.Content: I think the sweet spot of weapons is 200-400m, it's fast but not clipping-through the ship fast. It's just far enough to clip into the ship, then detonate inside.

@Spearka

yeah 6 + the other 2 on the sides... and are those rockets down the side?

I don't have a persist of after. I quicksaved and reloaded to make your persist, sorry. I can redo it if you like.

@ zekes, yeah, once a projectile seems to hit about 600m/s you have little hope of hitting, at 500m/s you're probally be ok but it gets riskier the more parts there are loaded.

Persist before I forget http://www./?43bixr0zrg8qf2q

This time I go for the new castle sadly little damage is done.

Well, I must say your ships have excellent armor.

Marder, which somehow survived it's close brush with death, went for the Unnamed Ship.

The first ASM i fired from 250m, did almost nothing. Second and third ones were from 2.2km and actually managed to "kill" it, or at least the command pod was knocked off. There is a bit powered, but it is pretty shattered. I'd say she's out of the battle. but WOW it took 3/4 of the Marder's ammo. It was like i was firing at a Drek XIV, i just couldn't pen that double armor. Had to go in the square corners, which are weaker BTW.
